Package com.example.butter

Class ImageDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.butter.ImageDB
public class ImageDB extends Object
This class can be used to interact with the "image" collection in Firebase author: Nate Pane (natepane)

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(android.net.Uri uri, String documentID, android.content.Context context)
      Adds a new image to the image collection of there isn't already an event associated with this document ID
      Parameters:
      uri - URI returned when the user selects an image from their gallery
      documentID - This document ID should either be a device ID for profile pictures, or event ID for event posters
      context -

    • update

      public void update(android.net.Uri uri, String documentID, android.content.Context context)
      updates an image in the image collection if there is already an image associated with the document ID
      Parameters:
      uri - URI returned when the user selects an image from their gallery
      documentID - This document ID should either be a device ID for profile pictures, or event ID for event posters
      context -

    • delete

      public void delete(String documentID)
      Deletes an image from the image collection if it exists
      Parameters:
      documentID - This document ID should either be a device ID for profile pictures, or event ID for event posters

    • imageUriToString

      private String imageUriToString(android.net.Uri uri, android.content.Context context)
      Converts an image URI into string data that can be stored in firebase
      Parameters:
      uri - URI returned when the user selects an image from their gallery
      context -
      Returns:
      String equivalent of the image

    • resizeBitmap

      private android.graphics.Bitmap resizeBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap original, int maxWidth, int maxHeight)
      resizes the bitmap in order to make the string data small enough to store in Firebase
      Parameters:
      original - original Bitmap to be resized
      maxWidth -
      maxHeight -
      Returns:
      returns a resized Bitmap for the same image

    • stringToBitmap

      public android.graphics.Bitmap stringToBitmap(String base64String)
      Converts string data into a Bitmap This method is public so that it can be conveniently used after fetching string data of an image from firebase
      Parameters:
      base64String - String data of an image
      Returns:
      Bitmap for the image
